name: Sysiphus
description:
Sisyphus is a game jam game I did with a team of 5 people in 2 days. 

We play Sisyphus, who has to climb a mountain pushing a rock over and over. The gameplay is really hard and tedious, but the player is constantly rewarded by a voice encouraging or provoking them to go further ! We tried to have a really mesmerizing mountain, quite dreamy, to push the player to advance and discover what's at the end of their task !

Game Design, some of the art and the sound design on this project.
